website_summaries.verdict: Ringside's Apex training gloves for women offer the best support for natural hand and fist alignment which reduces hand fatigue.
pros: Great protection for bag and pad work
Offers impact and wrist  protection with thick padding and knuckle support
great fit  with or without wraps

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these, unless you enjoy breaking your wrists. The curvature of the padding within the glove causes you to contact with your wrist slightly bent. If you know anything about throwing a punch, then you know this isn't proper technique. This isn't even safe and you'll feel it after your very first punch. Seriously don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: kyle howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I Love these Gloves, perfect for sparring and the heavy bag. I use them 4-5 days for at least 2 hrs. each workout and wish everybody at my gym had a pair. 1-2,combos, 1,1, 2, 3,3, combos - spinning back fist. Dude these are as good as my Cleto Reyes Gloves. Reyes are pretty pricey,these feel good & when I hit it's solid. I got the 16 oz. because I'm 180lbs. & don't want to really hurt anyone while sparring... Anyone that's into combat sports knows, when you catch a solid shot you feel it. The weight of the Glove is so we get quicker and build endurance. Thanks! Randy "Brito Kickboxing".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but prone to tearing with heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through two pair of these gloves already. I primarily do heavy bag drills several days a week. My fingertips have torn through the inner lining on both pair of gloves, which subsequently allows the lining/padding to slip and makes my hand wraps shift a little and tear the skin on my knuckles. I don’t think they’re bad gloves though. I think they fit pretty good, they’re pretty comfortable and they are a great color/design. I think they would be great for frequent sparring, but heavy bag seems to wreck them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole State

customer_reviews.title: These run small
customer_reviews.text: These things would be great if you had small hands. My fingers aren't incredibly long, but my wedding ring is 13.75 (to give you some perspective) and these things are a very tight squeeze with wraps. Without wraps is a lot better, but at the cost of a lot of wrist support. If you're heavy handed, it'll provide the knuckle support most people need, but I have found it to be hard on the wrists and not provide enough wrist support, you definitely want to wrap your wrists well before putting on these gloves. Of course your milage may vary depending on the type of training you're doing, your form, and how hard you go on bag
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Super supportive gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a massive fan of these gloves! I've been using them for nearly a year and they've held up marvelously. They've seen 4-5 days/week of cardio kickboxing and the support is still solid. I like the extra gel-like padding and they've done pretty well in terms of not getting overly smelly. They can be a bit stiff around the wrist at first, but it improves with use. Also, I initially purchased the smaller gloves but ended up swapping them out for the bigger ones. If you're something other than a stick figure, get the bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable, but seem to be warm and taht they could use better venting
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag gloves. So far they have proven to hold up well. The velcro closure keeps the gloves secure. The inside of the gloves is fairly soft and comfortable when using hand wraps. The color tends to get people's attention as well. Only gripe is that they could breathe better. Might be me, but my hands get very hot and very sweaty quickly. No issues with them starting to smell bad, so the venting must do a good enough job for drying. I do hang them up after each use though so that might help.
customer_reviews.author: Grant RuddTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: seemingly quaiity gloves as a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some bag gloves to replace a pair from Everlast that were just worn out. At the same time, I didn't want to spend a lot of money. I have been very pleased with these gloves. In comparing them to the Everlast gloves, the padding and fit is superior. I have fairly large hands, and the Large/Xtra Large provides a really snug fit with hand wraps. Also the extra reinforcement in the wrists provide welcome stiffness, and the velcro wrist straps are well designed to get a snug fit without needing assistance. As for durability, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pair of training gloves I have ever put on. The Velcro is strong, the material is durable, great wrist support and colors are true to the pictures. The IMF padding is hard at first but will soften with use. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Vo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for affordable gloves that would be pretty durable and these fit the bill. I got these in February and its August now and they are still holding up. I have noticed the insides of the gloves have started to peel off the padding a little and the padding isnt that amazing around my knuckles any more. I would only recommend these gloves as a beginner or training gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Sizes run a bit snug.
customer_reviews.text: Love them but they run a bit small. Once they’re on they are good, but for boxing workouts like “title” where you neede to go from station to station and need to take them off frequently they are a pain. Get a size up
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burroso

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use I've already purchased a new pair of higher quality, leather gloves. Out of the box these gloves feel super light and have a fair amount of padding on the knuckle area. The padding is super soft which would be great for sparring but I would prefer higher density for heavy bag/pad work. The gloves are still usable after a few months but the stitching in the velcro closure is coming undone and the hand compartment has loosened up in the knuckle/finger tips so they tend to slide a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have large hands that fit easily into most large-size glove
customer_reviews.text: Seems to run a bit on the small side, but very solid gloves. I have large hands that fit easily into most large-size glove, and can't fit wrap on them and get them into the gloves very comfortably. I've had other boxing gloves that weren't this snug. But these are well made and well padded.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good price good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 8 yr old. They also fit me.. so I either have little hands or they form good to other users. 2 yrs into using them a few times a week and there still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: B2

customer_reviews.title: Great looking gloves
customer_reviews.text: Just got these..size l/xl in 12oz. Outta the box they are snug. Im 5'9 with hand cir of 8 5/8'. Hope they will break in a bit. Dont know how i can fit wraps in them until they break in. Wich is okay because i dont try to beat the hell out of a heavy bag. They are great looking. 45 well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Boxing Gloves
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son is going through Black Belt prep classes and needed boxing gloves. He is signed up for 2nd degree Black Belt so I bought them big. He loves them and hasn’t mentioned that they are big. I know he will grow into them and still love them for many years. My son loves them so much that it got him more excited to go to Taekwondo classes.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Bag The Gloves
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars out of 5. This glove is not a conducive for heavy bag work. It's more geared towards working with mitts and double end bag. It does form well on the hand, and it's pliable enough to fit most hands with wraps. The foam protection is good, and the wrist has good support.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stillwater

customer_reviews.title: A definite repurchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, and he is still using them several times a week. He likes them, and has asked me to repurchase just in case he ever needs another pair. So..I would say these are made very well, and they get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: MelissaDawn

customer_reviews.title: Made me a loyal Ringside customer
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4" 115 lbs and ordered the S/M. These have been great for working the big bag and mitts (currently my only purpose for them - I do not spare with these...yet). These are comfortable and decently lightweight! I am very impressed, and my next set of gloves will be Ringside as well...
customer_reviews.author: Dana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Oh so soft and lovely!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are fantastic! They are a tad larger than other XL gloves. I have big hands. These fit properly snug with 180" Mexican style handwraps. There is no comparison to the Everlast gloves I was using. They are so much larger and better manufactured. The impact resistance is great. I worked out with them tonight and my wrists feel just fine. I am not sore like I would be with the Everlast gloves. I would highly recommend these and at $32 how could you go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Petrovich

customer_reviews.title: Great product, felt good after a few minutes of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, felt good after a few minutes of breaking in. I usually buy everlast from the local sporting good stores for my light bag work. I will never buy everlast again, these gloves feel great and offer more protection. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gloves! So happy with the fit too...I got a small/medium and they are perfect. I am not a petit person.. average height and weight
customer_reviews.author: Karen Williams

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband to who just began boxing classes. He used them only a couple of times on the punching bag and his knuckles were bleeding! The size was not the issue, they are just made of incredibly cheap, uncomfortable material. My husband was trying not to spend so much so we got these but we returned them days later and I found other brand gloves for $35 more than these and he never had an issue again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabeen A.

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these since January, alternating with my older pair, and these still don't feel properly broken in. I would not buy these again. They are attractive though.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Paige

customer_reviews.title: My first pair and The best so far.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on ordering these, but after weeks of looking. I went for quality not just price. I got a double KO with quality and price. I will order from this company again.Very pleased with the Speedy delivery! Keep up the great work
customer_reviews.author: Jez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with thick padding
customer_reviews.text: Best gloves ive used for bag work. I've used other gloves which use traditional foam that lose density farely quick which eventually feels like the padding of a yoga mat. These are thick and absorb impact very nicely. Seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug but great fit
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit snug, I have small hands I'm a girl 5'3" small hands. I got the m/l size so I could wear my wraps with these. They are VERY comfortable though and I love the foam. The impact is very nice in these and here is no pain in my knuckles after use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Easler

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I got the small to medium size cause I wanted to work on speed and accuracy. I don't use wraps so they fit fine. I've used them on pads and heavy bags and feel a good amount of cushion for my knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, protection and look great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves. Far better than the title gloves I was using previously. Great cushioning and protection from the heavy bag. Buy them u will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted D’zyne Studio

customer_reviews.title: these are very good gloves. Not intended for sparring
customer_reviews.text: For the money..these are very good gloves. Not intended for sparring...but for bag work and mitts...it gets 👍👍... It took me a few work outs to get use to them....I prefer more of a Mexican-style punchers glove. But these gloves offer great protection...and are built to last. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Clipper

customer_reviews.title: I like them! . The L/XL or 12oz I for some reason thought they were 16oz. Still nice though!
customer_reviews.text: I got the L/XL and they were only 12oz. I prefer 16oz to spar but other than that these are really nice gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got these. Love the color and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Been training for a month using the gyms gloves got these and wow. They feel and look great and after just one class I can feel the difference. Will update after a few months of training.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag gloves from a reputable name
customer_reviews.text: Anybody who knows boxing knows Ringside. I ordered the L/XL size which is 10oz. for bag work. These gloves are very well constructed. From the synthetic to the inner liner to the IMF padding. Perfect in every way. The fit is snug but not hand cramping snug. The mesh palm helps keep the hands cool during heavy bag sessions. The wrist support is top notch and the IMF padding absorbs all the punishment. If you are looking for a pair of bag gloves(do not spar in these) then I suggest you try these out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pero

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for the price. I've used it on a heavy bag for about a month now, and it works perfectly, not to mention that it doesn't reek of sweat like some other gloves do.
customer_reviews.author: Jayce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boxing gloves for daily training!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT boxing gloves for training. I have three boxers in my household, and they all train six times a week. These gloves are durable, comfortable, and they DON'T STINK! They've been a great purchase, and we recommend them highly!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Mom

customer_reviews.title: t they are really nice
customer_reviews.text: Just came in and I’m ready to smash on some heavy bags.. the only thing is that Thames are a bit tight but they are supposed to be i just won’t be able to wrap my hands which I’m supposed to but F#€K !t they are really nice
customer_reviews.author: shakool rashae tidwaldo

customer_reviews.title: Much snugger fit than Everlast size small
customer_reviews.text: As a 5' 4" woman with small hands, I was looking for really strong wrist support and a snug fit. I wear no larger than a 6.5" bracelet and was swimming in the size small Everlast brand provided by the gym. I bought these Ringside Apex gloves in small/medium and the size and weight of these gloves protects my smaller hands perfectly. I also love the lighter weight. Feeling pretty tough in these! Definitely recommend. .
customer_reviews.author: Moink

customer_reviews.title: Boxing Gloves worth the coins
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various types of gloves to utilize for boxing. I needed something simple but not cheap..safety is key! I was happy with my purchase and woudl do it again. My boxing experience (5yrs, class, bag/mitt work)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way more knuckle protection the title pros, but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Way more knuckle protection the title pros, but not as much wrist support. Got the L/xL with hands on the smaller side and they feel a bit tight with handwraps, probably need to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable ans stable
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, comfortable, appear durable so far. I've been using for 2 mos. As I break them in more I'll add to how they hold up. Best pair of gloves I've owned yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Cant believe I got these for 29$ !!!!! Very good gloves. Good wrist support, great knuckle protection. Feels great and dont get hot..even with wraps. Take time to get use to the IMF padding because its a little bit hard to land on the knuckles and because you dont feel any impact. Will be good for any level of boxing. Time will tell if they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: They look great!!
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp looking gloves. Good quality, and held up for my first few workouts with them. They are a little tight with hand wraps, but stretched out some already. I recommend a size up, even with small hands like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for the money - Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves for the money. Good wrist support and foam density. Not sure how well they will work over time for heavy bag work, but they seem great for mitts. Stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: I bought stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great Heavy Bag gloves for training
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are good quality and easy to get on and off. I use them as heavy bag gloves, and if they were a couple of ounces lighter they would be perfect. Still, they are vert durable, have lots of padding, and the velcro makes them easy to take on and off. For the price they are well worth the money. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok gloves not ringsides best
customer_reviews.text: Only 10oz great for kids to use for mitts or heavy bag. Not for use for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Unreal

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and she was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: feels like rubber. Not surprising but I've seen other "pleather" ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit is VERY snug with wraps on, depending how much you wrap on your knucles, it won't go on without screwing up the wrap. Outside is very plastic-y, feels like rubber. Not surprising but I've seen other "pleather" that feel more like leather. Probably fine for bag work, colors are cool but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nate A

customer_reviews.title: Mace Windu on these mf
customer_reviews.text: Been training with these for 6 mo now and I love them. Only downside is I tore through the inner seam by my fingers pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: Austin Wright

customer_reviews.title: Ripped stitching
customer_reviews.text: Stitching ripped after one week of use. I bought two of the same and the secondary pair is doing better but not holding by much. I have purchased many brands and have used several different models of ringside's gloves and either I got a few bad pairs or just the lower price models dont hold up to regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit. I dislike the front heavy cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves and good fit for older men
customer_reviews.text: Feels light and with enough padding to spar or hit the heavy bags. This is great for older men with joint issues
customer_reviews.author: Bravette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag gloves
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag gloves! A little snug, and my hands are not that big. I like the 10 oz vs 16 oz for the bag for better speed. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: North Texas Banana Hammer

customer_reviews.title: NOt sure if i buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot close my hand grip properly once i put my hand in the gloves. Also when i punch it hurts as inner hand grip is not proper fist.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these almost daily for almost six months. They have held up well. I use them for bag work, mitt work and sparring. They protect my hands much better than the cheaper gloves I had before. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are PERFECT for sparring!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are PERFECT for sparring! They are extremely light, but still offer enough cushion so that your hands don't hurt much after practice/sparring. I got the largest size, and they were a great fit. They also look awesome (this is a plus). I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian R.

customer_reviews.title: They are absolutely perfect for this
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a kickfit class. They are absolutely perfect for this. They are pretty light weight and work excellent on a heavy bag. Recommend for this type of use. I don't box... so I have no idea if they are any good for that purpose :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. West

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pink punchers
customer_reviews.text: Love these so far. I'm taking a boxing fitness class, just bag work, non- contact, and these gloves are cute and do the trick. Best when paired with handwraps to help protect your hand bones and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Bell

customer_reviews.title: Fits small hand perfectly
customer_reviews.text: With small hands it's hard to get a glove that fits well and gives you support. These are perfect. Took them to the gym and had a few others try them on and they got sooo many compliments. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Delgado

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great for the price. My knuckles get a little sore after hitting heavy bags, but it feels like much higher quality than the cheapest everlast gloves, so I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: iamvic

customer_reviews.title: Not huge like others but still offer good protection
customer_reviews.text: Im giving this order two stars for the seller (Bad Experience) and 5 stars for the product. These gloves are perefect for heavy bag work. Not huge like others but still offer good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: Package stolen!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this package was stolen off of my front porch before I arrived home from work. I’ve asked my neighbors and no one saw anything. I have these gloves in a smaller size with different colors and I love them! The product is great. The delivery should be executed differently.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: Great glove, they take a time to break/mold but they’re the best you’ll find for the price. Don’t bother with dicks sporting goods for the everlast brand.
customer_reviews.author: Theland216

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about three days now and it's a great glove for the price it has a snug fit and has alot of padding
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have had these gloves since December 2016 and it’s now June 2018 , still holding up and look damn near brand new , did have to buy a glove deodorizer but that’s cheap as far as maintenance goes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purple Punching Power!
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller than I expected so can't wrap, but perfect for easy workouts with pads. And such a pretty purple color!
customer_reviews.author: PancakesMajor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves for mitts, sparring, double end bag, and more but not good for heavy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I switched from 16oz to 12 oz gloves
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I switched from 16oz to 12 oz gloves, this have been amazing so far 3 months of use with no tears.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoe

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about these gloves - saw they had mixed reviews and decided to think positive. I've had them for about 7 weeks and they have torn in two places and I already need to replace them :( Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Decent training gloves
customer_reviews.text: They were a little tight at first with 180" wraps but after a good break in they are nice for the price . They are about 12oz in weight I would recommend the for a novice boxer or for entry-level training.
customer_reviews.author: mario vialpando

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. The gloves are comfortable and long lasting. I've used them 5 days a week for months and they look nearly as new as the day I got them. They fit a little snug but overall are a good feel.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lilakos

customer_reviews.title: Worst gloves i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Worst gloves i have ever used! But you get what you pay for. Very cheaply made and extremely uncomfortable. Would not recommend these, even for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best boxing gloves that I have ever owned in the past 7 years, high quality
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Too small for even small hands!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were way too tight even for my small hands. I could barely close them up! Even though I like the padding and the color, the unreasonably small and tight design means I just wasted my money and I will never use them!
customer_reviews.author: B. Dong

customer_reviews.title: Scrapes your mid knuckles even with handwraps
customer_reviews.text: Mid Knuckles got scraped up during use (yes, I used hand wraps and was punching correctly). I've used other gloves and never had this issue. Would look at other options before buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag gloves. It takes about 10 sessions to break in. But once broken in they feel like pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These gloves provide great wrist support, and the shock absorption is amazing, they feel so good to hit the heavy bag. Also fit very nice. They're comfortable and the metallic colors are a great addition. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed/Great-looking
customer_reviews.text: Use these at 9Round for kickboxing fitness. Awesome gloves. Well made and look sharp. Good padding to protect my hands on the heavy bag and wrecking ball. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: udubsalum

customer_reviews.title: I liked the design and color scheme
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design and color scheme, however these would have best offered in onces rather than size. Too snug.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH A. BARBATO

customer_reviews.title: These are SUPER AMAZING NICE gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are SUPER AMAZING NICE gloves. Perfect for a gift very nice fitting as well. Most definitely will buy again down the road 😃
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Upon initial inspection
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Upon initial inspection, it appears to be solidly constructed. However, after only one week of use the stitching ripped at the palms of one glove when I was putting in my deodorizer. Would have given more stars if it didn’t break after one week.
customer_reviews.author: Shiryn

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the L/XL and my hand did not fit. The glove did fit the S/M hands around my gym perfectly. As for quality and construction.... the glove appeared to be great!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Wrong weight.
customer_reviews.text: According to their sizing information it should be a 12oz glove, but they weigh 10oz. Luckily they're just bag gloves for me, so it's not too big a deal. Otherwise, I love the padding and how it becomes perfect when broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim Hashme

customer_reviews.title: Good cushion for the knuckles
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. Great price for the value. They are a bit snug when you first use them but once they are broken in, you’re good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: ringside boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have attempted to get in touch with Ringside regarding this product since the gloves were expensive and are already cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing except for the long shipping time.
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. The quality is insurmountable. The padding makes punching feel like the easiest thing to do and the wrist support is phenomenal. I do wear wraps with them because that's what I'm used to but they fit snug, not tight, without. The only reason I gave it a four star rating is because it took about 2 weeks for Amazon to actually ship the gloves out, however, delivery was the normal 3-5 business days.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Morris

customer_reviews.title: IMF TECH keeps your fist safe
customer_reviews.text: The best protection ever felt in my fist, bones, arms. It's super comfortable and It's cheaper than others. I bought another couple because they're really very well designed for keeping safe your hands and I felt great after every punch. Thanks for the IMF TECHNOLOGY. And nope, I'm not receiving anything for writing this review. I really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Xi Mena

customer_reviews.title: Loved the gloves
customer_reviews.text: Loved the gloves. They lasted about 3-4 months before the smell became pretty bad, even with airing them out. After 5 months I had to toss them. Did get lots of compliments on them, and fit great too.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kessner

customer_reviews.title: Hand protection
customer_reviews.text: Loves the gloves. If u want boxing gloves that genuinely protect your hands these r the gloves. Nice tight fit. Just wish there was a bit more support for the wrists though
customer_reviews.author: LOUISE JOSELYN

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife for JKD and MMA training. Very high quality. Fast shipping. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Serious Heavy Bag Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality, great wrist support. Gift to son who works out every day and he says they are the best he ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Fierce and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! Great quality, perfect fit, really comfortable. Can’t wait to hit the gym with them tomorrow!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size or model
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller Size. Even though it says XL is less than 14 oz. recommend gt2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sizing chart is pretty accurate. The green color is very vibrant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a little guy who totally into kickboxing. The sizing chart is pretty accurate. The green color is very vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: great quality! Son said they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, great quality! Son said they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Junior Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: excellent heavy bag glove
customer_reviews.text: A great heavy bag glove. The foam is a lot harder than a sparring glove and the closure does help with some wrist support. Delivery was quick and product in new condition upon arrival. I would recommend still doing wrist wraps underneath for extra supports.
customer_reviews.author: Trillian

customer_reviews.title: Most popular gloves in the gym..
customer_reviews.text: I love my ringside gloves! Excellent functionality, even better aesthetics. I'm a recreational boxer exercising solely for fitness and weight loss purposes, but I have used these for months and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: L Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend them if your looking for something to train with.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not well for heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad glove, but too much room inside even with knuckle padded wraps. I also like a more compact, sturdy glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! I use them daily and they still feel brand new! There was no "break-in" time as they felt great straight out of the box. They're also easy to wipe down after a good workout and the mesh exterior by the palms helps keeps my hand dry and comfortable. Love these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, but much too small for my boyfriend's ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, but much too small for my boyfriend's hands. The insides tore from being stretched after two uses. He is still using them, though. Other than the size issue they are great gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Ringside Apex Boxing Kickboxing Muay Thai Training Gloves Gel Sparring Punching Bag Mitts
product_meta.description:
Fight your way to the top with Ringside?s Apex Boxing Gloves. Boxing is the undisputed champion of the all-inclusive, comprehensive fitness workout and these durable synthetic gloves will help you push your body every time you put them on. 

A tapered, wrap-around closure provides secure wrist support, while the hook & loop closure allows you to take them on and off in seconds - getting you to that boxing cardio workout faster.

The Ringside Apex Bag Glove is the perfect boxing glove for bag work, boxing fitness workouts, and shadow boxing--pick your favorite color today!



 * IMF Technology
 * A ventilated palm and thumb keep the hands dry and comfortable during your workout
 * Multiple colors to match your style
 * Need a larger hand compartment? Check out the Ringside Apex Flash Sparring Gloves (FTG2)
feature_bullets: Boxing is the undisputed champion of the all-inclusive, comprehensive workout and these gel sparring punch bag mitts will help you push your body to reach your athletic and fitness goals
A tapered wrap-around closure provides non-slip secure wrist support while the full hook & loop closure allows you to take them on and off in seconds
These punching MMA Muay Thai gloves feature Stay-Dri Lining which promotes microbial protection and ventilation holes in mesh palm and thumb to rapid dry water and sweat for optimal comfort

IMF (Injected Molded Foam) Technology is superior to layered-foam and some Molded Foam gloves providing better protection and durability - Our exclusive pre-curved molded hand compartment supports natural hand and fist alignment when striking
Include a traditional boxing grip bar that allows a tighter fist and reduces hand fatigue and made of affordably durable and easy to clean textured synthetic leather material
